divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting out side smoking a cig.when a light just apear almost above me.At first I thougt it was a airplain,but no sound and looked different. It was spinng and turn redish color with a big white light with a black spot in the middle moving slower then an airplain.then disapeared.Thats about 3 times i seen lights come and go over Porterville.It kind of makes a person think whats going on cause theres wierd things going no. looked like 2 round shapes on each side
Summary: It moved slow and no sound And the middle was spinning with yellow,redish color with a white blinking light with a black spot and 2 other object in the side.
